page.title: 02RURAL N.W. Essex
page.content: Saffron Walden is in N.W. Essex. There are several farms and small villages around though none of the villages fall into our 12 sq.km. Most of the farms concentrate on grain production. There is also some dairy and beef farming. There used to be a pig market and cattle market in the town. Both of these are now closed. The farmers send their animals to larger markets outside the town. Most of the people who live in the area no longer work in agriculture. The farms need only a few workers because of the use of machines.
